questions: Q. 5. Mention any three features of arid soils.
answers: Ans.  Arid soils range from red to brown in colour.  They are generally sandy in texture and saline in nature.  Due to dry climate, high temperature, evaporation is faster and the soil lacks humus and moisture.

questions: Q. 13. Define the following terms :  Current fallow land  Other than current fallow  Culturable waste land
answers: Ans.  Current fallow land : Left uncultivation for one or less than one agricultural year.  Other than current fallow : Left uncultivated for past 1 to 5 agricultural years.  Cultural waste land : Left uncultivated for more than 5 agricultural years.  1×3=3 5 marks each
